location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Auditor of Civil Accounts, Public Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has obscured a small portion of the body of the letter on the recto side of the folio.

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that his disbursements from February to April 1815 have been passed, barring a couple of exceptions which are detailed in the letter.The letter encloses a copy of a letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay to John Kaye, dated 27 September 1815. It requests that the Resident at Bushire be instructed to provide a statement of expenses for house rent, deet, and table servants for examination by the Bombay Government.
